bibdata.title: American National Standard Specifications Distribution Fuse Disconnecting Switches, Fuse Supports, and Current-Limiting Fuses
American National Standard Specifications Distribution Fuse Disconnecting Switches, Fuse Supports, and Current-Limiting Fuses

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard is a revision of American National Standard Specifications for Distribution Fuse Disconnecting Switches, Fuse Supports, and Current Limiting Fuses, ANSI C37.47-1969, to bring it up to date and in line with present requirements for high-voltage fuses and switches.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
